targets.rawSql:
select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'REBAJAR_RIZZI'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'REBAJAR_ALPE'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'TAIC'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'LINEA DESCARNAR'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'DIVIDIR MOSCONI'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'REBAJAR_POLETTO'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'ABLANDAR CRUST POSICION 1'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'ABLANDAR CRUST POSICION 2'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'ESCURRIR BAUCE (OSCUROS)'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'VACIO CARTIGLIANO 6P'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'APILADOR TAIC'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'APILADOR CRUST'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'ESCURRIR BAUCE (CLAROS)'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'VIEWER'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'PISTOLA (400)'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'PISTOLA (401)'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'PISTOLA (402)'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'PISTOLA (403)'
order by mast.time asc

select count(mach.id) as "Machines"
	from machines mach

select count(distinct mach.id) as "Running with PO"
from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where state in ('5')
and mast."time" between now() - interval '30s' and now()

select count(distinct mach.id) as "Running without PO"
from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where state in ('4')
and mast."time" between now() - interval '30s' and now()

select count(distinct mach.id) as "Idle machine"
from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where state in ('2')
and mast."time" between now() - interval '30s' and now()

select count(distinct mach.id) as "Stopped machine"
from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where state in ('3')
and mast."time" between now() - interval '30s' and now()

select count(distinct mach.id) as "Offline"
from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where state in ('0','1')
and mast."time" between now() - interval '30s' and now()
